Posted By: Kryptnyt (1/28/2011 6:14:13 AM)

posts.post_content:
Well, Goatllama, if we're going for massive typeline, why don't we keep going?   
  
Use [Liquimetal Coating](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Liquimetal Coating) and his own -1 ability to turn him into an Artifact Creature Planeswalker, alright, cool.  
  
*Now* play [Enchanted Evening](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Enchanted Evening) and turn him into an Artifact Creature Enchantment Planeswalker. Not enough? Alright, equip Tezzeret with [Runed Stalactite](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Runed Stalactite) and then play [Life and Limb](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Life and Limb). Hell, let's go even more out there!  
  
Play [Rimefeather Owl](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Rimefeather Owl) and then use its ability to put an ice counter on it, giving it the snow subtype!  
  
Tezzeret, Agent of Bolas  
  
Snow Artifact Creature Enchantment Land Planeswalker - Forest Tezzeret  
  
(( In addition to being all creature types. ))  
  
You, proud sir, are now in ownership of the greatest card known to Magicdom. Even Storm Crow weeps at it's awesome typeline.
posts.html:
Well, Goatllama, if we're going for massive typeline, why don't we keep going?

Use Liquimetal Coating and his own -1 ability to turn him into an Artifact Creature Planeswalker, alright, cool.

Now play Enchanted Evening and turn him into an Artifact Creature Enchantment Planeswalker. Not enough? Alright, equip Tezzeret with Runed Stalactite and then play Life and Limb. Hell, let's go even more out there!

Play Rimefeather Owl and then use its ability to put an ice counter on it, giving it the snow subtype!

Tezzeret, Agent of Bolas

Snow Artifact Creature Enchantment Land Planeswalker - Forest Tezzeret

(( In addition to being all creature types. ))

You, proud sir, are now in ownership of the greatest card known to Magicdom. Even Storm Crow weeps at it's awesome typeline.

Posted By: Gaffy00 (8/19/2011 11:32:00 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
@MasterofBearLore  
  
He still can die from a state-based action.  
  
-If two Planeswalkers are in the battlefield with the same subtype, he'll be put into the graveyard.  
  
-If his loyalty counters are reduced to 0, the planeswalker will be put into the graveyard.  
  
@TrueBloodWolf  
  
Waste\*  
  
Also, you can use its -1 on a 1/1 Artifact Creature. It's only condition it's that it needs to be an artifact, which artifact creatures are. There doesn't need to be a rule that says you can use it on a 1/1 Artifact Creature for you to be able to use it, but rather a rule that says you don't: e.g; if it said on it's -1 "Target nonartifact becomes a 5/5 artifact creature," then you obviously couldn't use it on a 1/1, but since it only says artifact then you can.
posts.html:
@MasterofBearLore

He still can die from a state-based action.

-If two Planeswalkers are in the battlefield with the same subtype, he'll be put into the graveyard.

-If his loyalty counters are reduced to 0, the planeswalker will be put into the graveyard.

@TrueBloodWolf

Waste*

Also, you can use its -1 on a 1/1 Artifact Creature. It's only condition it's that it needs to be an artifact, which artifact creatures are. There doesn't need to be a rule that says you can use it on a 1/1 Artifact Creature for you to be able to use it, but rather a rule that says you don't: e.g; if it said on it's -1 "Target nonartifact becomes a 5/5 artifact creature," then you obviously couldn't use it on a 1/1, but since it only says artifact then you can.

posts.post_content:
This is the most powerful a Planeswalker is allowed to be before it gets bonked on the head with a ban-hammer. Expect it to start showing up a lot more now that it's only real competition is fairly dead and gone. His colors are Blue and Black, and he's all about artifacts. And we just finished an Artifact block.   
  
Did you know Sword of Feast and Famine was an artifact, causing his "Impulse" to read something like 'yeah, you just got Jace's 'Brainstorm' AND Stoneforge Mystic's 'Tinker' on one card, in one move, and you gained loyalty to do it." 4x Sword of Feast and Famine, 4x Sword of War and Peace instead of 1x each, and you can hit it pretty consistently, even with no other artifacts in the deck. But you probably want Tumble Magnets, or something. =)  
  
Tezzperet Caw?  
  
I think I finally figured out the secret drawback of Sword of Feast and Famine- Wizards thought nobody would play a card that forced them to have to carry all those prize packs back to their car, actually have to find ... [(see all)](javascript:void(0);)
